credits

hypothes.is↗ - hypothes.is is a browser extension for annotating any website. With it, you can highlight and make notes on anything you find online. I use this to mark up the sources I find (see my references on the internet, and the annotations I make are adapted to notes here.

Easy Bib↗ - Easy Bib is a web service I use to create citations for my references. It’s free to use, though some features do require you set up an account.

Jekyll↗ - Jekyll is the static-site generator I use to make this site.

jekyll-theme-console↗ - the theme I use which is amazingly simple and suits my purpose very well.

Netlify↗ - the service I use to deploy this site online.

made with <3 using Jekyll↗ and jekyll-theme-console↗
